Class FriendDAO

    • Constructor Detail

      • FriendDAO

        private FriendDAO()
        Singleton pattern uses a private constructor to ensure that this class can only be instantiated once. The constructor loads the friendship data from the friendships.csv and assigns it to instance attribute allRequests.
